member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.Verb
member.summary: This activity's verb, indicating what action was performed. Possible values are: - add - User added new content to profile or album, e.g. video, photo. - post - User publish content to the stream, e.g. status, scrap. - update - User commented on an activity. - make-friend - User added a new friend. - birthday - User has a birthday.

member.summary: The date of creation of this poll

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.Description
member.summary: The poll description.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.EndingTime
member.summary: The ending date of this poll or empty if the poll doesn't have one.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.HasVoted
member.summary: Whether the user has voted on this poll.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.Id
member.summary: The poll ID.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.Image
member.summary: The image representing the poll. Field is omitted if no image exists.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.IsClosed
member.summary: Whether the poll is not expired if there is an expiration date. A poll is open (that is, not closed for voting) if it either is not expired or doesn't have an expiration date at all. Note that just because a poll is open, it doesn't mean that the requester can vote on it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.IsMultipleAnswers
member.summary: Whether this poll allows voting for more than one option.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.IsOpenForVoting
member.summary: Whether this poll is still opened for voting. A poll is open for voting if it is not closed, the user has not yet voted on it and the user has the permission to do so, which happens if he/she is either a community member or the poll is open for everybody.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.IsRestricted
member.summary: Whether this poll is restricted for members only. If a poll is open but the user can't vote on it, it's been restricted to members only. This information is important to tell this case apart from the one where the user can't vote simply because the poll is already closed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.IsSpam
member.summary: Whether the user has marked this poll as spam. This only affects the poll for this user, not globally.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.IsUsersVotePublic
member.summary: If user has already voted, whether his vote is publicly visible.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.CommunityPoll.IsVotingAllowedForNonMembers
member.summary: Whether non-members of the community can vote on the poll.

member.summary: Identifies this resource as a community poll. Value: "orkut#communityPoll"
